translations: 适宜雇用的；有资格任职的
可雇用者；符合最低雇用要求者

sentences.sentence: People need basic education if they are to become employable.
sentences.translation: 若想要受雇，人们需要基础教育。

sentences.sentence: It's very easy to spend four years majoring in English literature and come out no more employable than you were before you went in.
sentences.translation: 花四年时间主修英国文学，到头来却发现自己并不比入学前更具有就业能力，这是很常见的。

sentences.sentence: It is unlikely that Generation Z will be done with education at 18 or 21; they will need to be constantly upskilling throughout their career to stay employable.
sentences.translation: Z 世代的学业不可能在18或21岁时就结束，他们需要在整个职业生涯中不断提高技能，以保持就业能力。
